Description.Text: This hotel is located in the heart of Wroclaw, just 500 metres from the main market square. The football stadium is just 15 km away and the airport is around 10 km away.

The modern rooms at the hotel come with an en suite bathroom with a shower, electronically adjustable beds and DVD players. The rooms also come equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite TV, Internet access, a radio, individually regulated air conditioning and tea and coffee making facilities as standard.

This air-conditioned hotel offers a 24-hour reception, cloakroom and lift access to the upper floors. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar and in the morning they can enjoy a tasty breakfast, which can also be served to their room. Guests can also organise barbecues on site. Wireless Internet access is available and guests arriving by car may leave their vehicles in the hotel car park.
